titles.title: BRIDGE Act
BRIDGE Act
Broadband Reform and Investment to Drive Growth in the Economy Act of 2020
A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to provide grants to States and Indian Tribes to deploy affordable, high-speed broadband to unserved and underserved areas.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Broadband Reform and Investment to Drive Growth in the Economy Act of 2020 or BRIDGE Act
This bill establishes a grant program through which the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) must award grants to states and tribes for use in deploying broadband to certain areas. The bill also provides funding for the FCC to create broadband maps.
